job.command: cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} # setup 64b setup gcc451 set dir = `dirname $PWD` set ver = `basename $dir` starver $ver echo $INPUTFILE0 | grep ':' if (! $?) then set evtsFile = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $1}'` set f = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $2}'` set l = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $3}'` else set evtsFile = $INPUTFILE0; set f = 1 set l = 50000 endif echo "${evtsFile}" if (! -r ${evtsFile}) exit 1; set file = `basename $evtsFile .daq` set dir = `dirname $evtsFile`; set logFile = ${file}_${f}_${l}B.log set output = ${file}_${f}_${l}.event.root if ( -r $output) exit 0; # P2011a => B2011,BAna,hitfilt,VFMinuit,l3onl,emcDY2,fpd,ftpc,trgd,ZDCvtx,NosvtIT,NossdIT,analysis # BAna => dEdxY2,CMuDst,analysis # root4star -q -b 'bfc.C('${f}','${l}',"B2011,BAna,VFMinuit,l3onl,emcDY2,fpd,ftpc,trgd,ZDCvtx,NosvtIT,NossdIT,pmdReco,btof,mtdDat,BEmcChkStat,Corr4,alignment,NoHistos,noRunco,noTags","'${evtsFile}'","'${output}'")' >& ${logFile} # root4star -q -b 'bfc.C('${f}','${l}',"B2011,BAna,VFMinuit,l3onl,trgd,ZDCvtx,NosvtIT,NossdIT,btof,mtdDat,Corr4,alignment,NoHistos,noRunco,noTags","'${evtsFile}'","'${output}'")' >& ${logFile} #P2011a pmdReco btof mtdDat BEmcChkStat -evout Corr4 OSpaceZ2 OGridLeak3D -hitfilt root4star -q -b 'bfc.C('${f}','${l}',"P2011a,pmdReco,btof,mtdDat,BEmcChkStat,Sti,-evout,Corr4,OSpaceZ2,OGridLeak3D,-hitfilt,NoHistos,noRunco,noTags","'${evtsFile}'","'${output}'")' >& ${logFile}
